sourcesContent:
<button 
    [ngClass]="isPrimary ? 'text-white bg-blue-500' 
    : 'bg-white text-black border-[1px] border-zinc-300'"
    class="px-3 h-9 text-center rounded-md"
    [class]="disabled ? 'text-zinc-400' : 'text-black'"
    [disabled]="disabled"
    (click)="clickEvent"
>
    {{text}}
</button>
